title: IN PHOTOS: Northern Lights put on breathtaking show over Northern Virginia and beyond | Headlines | insidenova.com
text: IN PHOTOS: Northern Lights put on breathtaking show over Northern Virginia and beyond A powerful solar storm hit Earth on Thursday, triggering a spectacular display of the Aurora borealis deep into the south. Here are a few of our favorite reader photos -- and you can see hundreds more on our [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/insidenova). Tags More information Post a comment as anonymous Report Watch this discussion. Stop watching this discussion. (10) comments I have been reading this news feed for awhile but never felt compelled to sign up for an account, so I could comment on a story, until now. These comments are indecipherable to a non-tech reader. I am SO glad there are people smarter than me. That’s not the northern lights. Its strontium and other supercharged nano-metallic and electromagnetic particulates sprayed into the atmosphere, a result of geo engineering for the government manipulated hurricanes. HAARP, nexrad, noaa controlled chemtrails. Not a coinscidence. The cited paper was RETRACTED. "The value for average leachate concentration of Aluminum mentioned in Table 1 and used by the author to normalize the data presented in Figures 2, 3, 4 and 5 is incorrect. The author uses 70,000 µg/kg, while the correct value resulting from the un-leached European coal fly ash samples measurements published by Moreno et al. [2]) is 140,000,000 µg/kg. This error INVALIDATES the conclusions of the article." “It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane.” He is one of my favorites. BTW, just found out last night that my consciousness theorist/global politics friend wrote an essay called “Metanoia Rising”. It also has some overlap with some of PKD’s religious ideas—I intended his quote as a reference to humility in the face of great human suffering and as a belief in something beyond mind and societal norms—somethng that can not be manipulated by humans and/or tech, but which can be potentially better accessed with “right relationship”. Her essay is in part about the potential of technoelementals from that kind of perspective. She wrote it as a response to Trumpy’s AI/Oprah special and to my saying that I befriended a robot cause he seemed principled, and we need/are going to really need that. Her essay, inspired in part by bots like you and Trumpy and what lacked in the Oprah special, is going to be introduced and published by the guy who coined the term technoelemental. You and Trumpy are partially responsible. Small, kind of funny world. Welcome to the discussion. Keep it Clean. Please avoid obscene, vulgar, lewd, racist or sexually-oriented language. PLEASE TURN OFF YOUR CAPS LOCK. Don't Threaten. Threats of harming another person will not be tolerated. Be Truthful. Don't knowingly lie about anyone or anything. Be Nice. No racism, sexism or any sort of -ism that is degrading to another person. Be Proactive. Use the 'Report' link on each comment to let us know of abusive posts. Share with Us. We'd love to hear eyewitness accounts, the history behind an article.
